description:
Hanaukyou Hokusai is http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou]`s grandfather, the previous head of the http://anidb.net/ch26309 [Hanaukyou household] and a mysterious guy (in the http://anidb.net/a1555 [La Verit√©] version).
He is responsible for the http://anidb.net/ch26371 [Blue Silent Bell] project.
name: Hanaukyou Hokusai
